mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userName, host_id AS userHost, user_name AS userCName, hire_type AS hireType, dep1 AS dep1 FROM host_users where user_id=#{userId} and host_id=#{hostId}

SELECT user_id AS userName, host_id AS userHost, user_name AS userCName, hire_type AS hireType from host_users where (hire_type='正式' or hire_type='实习' or hire_type='实习（HC）') and hire_flag=1 and user_type!='R'
SELECT user_id AS userName, host_id AS userHost, user_name AS userCName, hire_type AS hireType from host_users where user_name LIKE '%'||#{userName}||'%'
